channel.title: Posts on Greg Heiman Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Greg Heiman Personal Website

item.description: Posts First Post Using Org Mode, Hugo, and Ox-Hugo :first-post:org:hugo:ox-hugo: This is my first post on my new personal website.

item.title: Why make a personal website?
item.description: A personal website is a concept that I have been throwing around in my head for a while now. It has always been a concept that I have been interested in, but I have yet to take the dive till now. I think the greatest accomplishment of a personal website is the idea that it represents a canvas for your ideas. You can do whatever and post whatever you want onto a personal website.
